title: Despite Listeria Warnings Recalled Ice Cream Shows Up Online
teaser: Blue Bell Creameries recalled all of its products last month after a listeria outbreak. A few weeks ago, tubs of Cookies and Cream and Dutch Chocolate appeared on eBay. They're still up on Craiglist.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
